settings.content: Product appearence settings for Collection page, Related products and Featured collection section.

settings.label: Masonry layout
settings.info: Enable if your product images are different ratios. For more information [click here](https://safeasmilk.zendesk.com/hc/en-gb/articles/115001766369).

settings.label: Product background color
settings.info: Visible on hover and when product images have transparent background.

settings.label: Search popup menu
settings.info: We recommend creating a link list of the most visited parts of your store.

settings.content: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: USD CAD GBP AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.label: Favicon image
settings.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px
